meanings.definition: Saturants: substances that saturate or fill completely
meanings.sent1: The saturants in the recipe made the cake very moist.
meanings.sent2: The painter used saturants to mix the colors and create a vibrant painting.
meanings.sent3: The saturants in the sponge soaked up all the water in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like saturants, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The saturants in the soil helped the plants grow quickly and healthily.

meanings.definition: Saturants: agents that cause saturation or fullness
meanings.sent1: The saturants in the detergent made the clothes smell fresh.
meanings.sent2: The saturants in the solution reached maximum capacity, causing it to overflow.
meanings.sent3: The saturants in the balloon made it expand until it popped!
meanings.sent4: His words acted as saturants, filling her heart with love.
meanings.sent5: The saturants in the air made it heavy and humid during the storm.
